hackathon-description-text: This event offers independents and teams the opportunity to engage in solving a major challenge facing the water industry. 20% of all water produced is lost in leakage!
hackathon-eligibility:
Please develop your project at the event (or online), submit project through Devpost, and participate in the Thursday pitching and judging.
In order to be eligible for prizes, you must 
Individuals (over 18 years in age);
Up to 5 people attending per organisation
Any size
United Kingdom and overseas welcome
You must register to attend the Coventry and Warwickshire Business Growth festival. Details will be provided on registration.
hackathon-requirements: How does the concept effectively support operational leakage measurement and preventative decision making?

for all participants. You'll need to bring a signed copy with you on the day or be prepared to sign at the start of ther event (one signature per organisation is sufficient).

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Most impactful insight that supports new measurement model or asset intelligence for decision making
Provides a new way of looking at aspects of the challenge which could lead to new approaches in everyday operations
Apply to participate as a small team and secure one of six sponsored places.  Register your interest with

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How useful is the report in its intended real world situation
How complete or polished the report is.
How unique and innovative is the report in application
How well-designed is the report, paying attention to user experience and user interface

hackathon-description-header: Help us make informed decisions and reduce leakage!
